EmailTemplate.subject: Invitation to South London's first Challenge Society event
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}
On 26th November as part of the We are Youth campaign we are holding an event in Croydon for a limited number of lucky graduates. Are you up for a real challenge and getting your hands a bit dirty?
The day will involve three exciting community-based challenges: - A recycled arts challenge creating lanterns out of recycled materials - Performance challenge with experienced drama or circus skills practitioner, and - Practical action to renovate a local area called College Green.
You can take part in each of these activities, and there will be a free lunch provided at 1pm.
Please RSVP by clicking on the following link: http://www.clicktools.com/survey?iv=39133822b338702&q1={!Contact.Id}
Places are limited so sign up now before it's too late! Only those who have RSVP'd will be allowed in.
Where: Croydon Clocktower Katharine Street Croydon London CR9 1ET
When: 26/11/2011
10:00 - 17:15
Best wishes, The Challenge
